/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with bare trees, their leafless branches reaching towards the clear blue sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in the soft light of the day. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the scene.
